template.name: Scheduler

transition.label: c == 240000 && running[1] == 0 && running[2] == 0 && running[3] == 0 && running[4] == 0 && schedulable[3] == false && schedulable[4] == false

template.name: PeriodicThread
template.parameter: const PeriodicID pID, const int period, const int deadline, const int offset
template.declaration: clock releasedTime;

template.name: SporadicThread
template.parameter: const SporadicID sID, const int minIA, const int deadline
template.declaration: clock releasedTime;

transition.label: fire[sID]?
schedulable[sID] = true, fireable[sID] = false, releasedTime = 0, runScheduler()
